page.title: 10MRS. CALCUTT
page.content: Mrs Calcutt's house was built in 1949 and was the first house on her side of the road.In Combe mains electricity was installed in 1934, water a year later and sewage in 1965/1970 (there are no gasmains in Combe).There isn't a police or fire station in Combe but there used to be a policeman. There is a mobile shop that comes on Fridays, a fish man comes on Thursdays and a fish & chip van on Wednesday. They have a mobile library on Thursday and a video hire on Fridays. They used to have three shops but now they don't have any. They don't have any garages which service cars or sell petrol so they have to go to a garage near Woodstock.They dont have aimes we use the computer or watch schools programmes on the TV.At 10.30we play on the playground or field for 15 minutes.At 3pm a bell rings & we walk or bus home.(C.NIZIOL & K.WHITE).
